title: New free champion rotation: Lee Sin, Rumble, Syndra and more!

replies.body: Why the heck is {{champion:27}} 10 difficulty? All you have to do is run around people farting on them.....
{{champion:27}} is hard  to use
This person made me laugh
It's just a completely different playstyle than most champs, that's really the only reason. No other champ has a playstyle of "chase me, because I will kill you during that chase."
every time i watch/play a sion using R i yell "GOTTA GO FAST" and then put the sanic theme on max volume.
he is hard to get kills on, but that is about it.
Maybe he's rated that way because he needs teamwork to work properly?

{{champion:119}} Nothing needs to be said.
{{champion:43}} Sa'ela sa, Tiere vin.
{{champion:64}} Come at me with the kick!
{{champion:25}} Three seconds no movement, a basic Olaf ult, and shackles.
{{champion:68}} Who you callin little?
{{champion:27}} I think someone wants to be chased.
{{champion:134}} Someone you don't want chasing you.
{{champion:110}} Arrows that pierce, plus a little snaring.
{{champion:254}} Punches everywhere.
{{champion:101}} Permaban, he starts Ascended!

A) apologies for butchering the Ionian.
B) what does Pleb mean?

Here you go good sir: http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=pleb
That should clear it up.

{{champion:101}} does that already

I love how {{champion:27}} Singed is looking at {{champion:134}} Syndra's boobs. Meanwhile the {{champion:64}} Lee Sin in the group picture is the old splash art while in the individual stat picture it is the new one.
Do you know why he stare? because {{champion:27}} is debating whether "To shake, or not to shake!"
